inclusion.criterion: CDI is confirmed by clinical symptoms and rapid CDI test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has not been treated with medication for CDI within the last 10 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving immunosuppressive therapy (chemotherapy) or undergoing a stem cell transplant procedure for a hematological malignancy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Any woman of childbearing potential requires negative serum or urine pregnancy test before entry to the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The subject has experienced more than one previous episode of CDI within the 3 months
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with confirmed CDI, not treated with medication for CDI in the last 10 days. However, she has experienced more than one previous episode of CDI within the 3 months.
